script:
1). We finished calculating his taxes, didn't we?
Yes, I thought we did. 
No, we have calculated them.
No, you haven't.
2). Are you going to the national conference this year?
No, I'm not going to make it. 
Yes, it was held in Florida.
It's from the 10th to the 15th.
3). Shouldn't Mr. Weeking participate in the conference call?
No, we shouldn't call him back.
You're right. He really should. 
Yes, he should go to the conference.
